scripts.build-release: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-api
scripts.build-release-all: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-wasm-release-mt && npm run build-api
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-wasm-debug && npm run build-api
scripts.release_publish: npm run set-version && npm run build-release-all && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.build-wasm-debug: em++ --bind -O3 -gsource-map -std=c++17 --source-map-base http://localhost:5000/web-ifc-js/wasm-lib/ -flto -fno-exceptions./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s ASSERTIONS=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS"] -O3 -o dist/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-wasm-release: em++ --bind -O3 -std=c++17 -flto --define-macro=REAL_T_IS_DOUBLE -I ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/  -I ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/platform/javascript/ ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp  ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/csg.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/aabb.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/basis.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/math_funcs.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/os/memory.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/os/mutex.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/thirdparty/misc/pcg.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/plane.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/quaternion.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/random_pcg.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/transform_3d.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/vector2.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/vector3.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s USE_PTHREADS=0 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS"] -O3 -o dist/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-wasm-release-mt: em++ --bind -O3 -std=c++17 -flto --define-macro=REAL_T_IS_DOUBLE -I ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/  -I ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/platform/javascript/ ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp  ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/csg.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/aabb.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/basis.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/math_funcs.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/os/memory.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/os/mutex.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/thirdparty/misc/pcg.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/plane.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/quaternion.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/random_pcg.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/transform_3d.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/vector2.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/godot-csg/core/math/vector3.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s USE_PTHREADS=1 -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=navigator.hardwareConcurrency -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS"] -O3 -o dist/web-ifc-mt.js
scripts.build-api: cpy src/*.ts dist && cpy src/helpers/*.ts dist/helpers && npm run build-ts-api && npm run build-web-ifc-api-mjs && npm run build-web-ifc-api-browser && npm run build-web-ifc-api-node && npm run copy-to-dist
scripts.build-ts-api: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && cpy dist/web-ifc-api.d.ts dist && cpy dist/web-ifc-api.d.ts dist --rename=web-ifc-api-node.d.ts
scripts.copy-to-dist: cpy README.md dist && cpy package.json dist && cpy src/ifc2x4.ts dist
scripts.build-viewer: npm run bundle-viewer && npm run copy-wasm-viewer
scripts.copy-wasm-viewer: cpy dist/*.wasm examples/viewer/wasm && cpy dist/web-ifc-mt.worker.js examples/viewer
scripts.docker-run: npm run docker-run-container && npm run docker-get-compiled-files
